plot: Edgar and his bumbling in-laws are interior decorators but they end up in the wrong house and trash it with their incompetence.
title: Good Housewrecking
plot_es: Edgar and his bumbling in-laws are interior decorators but they end up in the wrong house and trash it with their incompetence.
plot_en: Edgar and his bumbling in-laws are interior decorators but they end up in the wrong house and trash it with their incompetence.
